attributes.action: Demand justice for racism on social media!!
attributes.additional_details: This behaviour cannot be tolerated in our society and may be stopped NOW! Please don’t let this continue.
attributes.background: Racism on social media cannot go unpunished, each racist remark on Facebook and Instagram and Twitter (particularly after the euros) must be followed up and charges made against them.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions to prosecute individuals are a matter for the police and prosecuting authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
